product_name: Overland Equipment Bayliss Shoulder Bag - Women's
long_description: For the uber-organized individuals among us, the Overland Equipment Bayliss bag features 3 compartments to hold gadgets, cards, keys and more. 3 separate compartments provide dedicated storage for all your daily essentials. Secure zippered main compartment protects your wallet and checkbook. Zippered middle pocket features fleece-lined pockets for your cell phone, digital camera and digital music player. External organizer pocket features a magnetic closure and is gusseted to keep pens/pencils, keys and spare change from spilling out. Ergonomic design with adjustable shoulder strap lays comfortably across the body when thrown over a shoulder. Nylon construction ensures long-lasting use.
short_description: For the uber-organized individuals among us, the Overland Equipment Bayliss bag features 3 compartments to hold gadgets, cards, keys and more.
